What can you do to be kind?
Quite a few times, I let other people do something that they wanna do...
...even though I didn't like it that much.
Sometimes at the playground my friends are sad,...
...and I sit next to them and talk to them.
And my grandpa's birthday is coming up...
...so I made him a birthday card with sparkly pens my mom has.
It means not to be so hard on them and not to be so harsh and cruel.
Don't say mean stuff to them and try not to hurt their feelings.
God wants us to do that and it's the right thing.
